CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Aether Tech relative to Crimson Analytics?
SRP.A: Aether Tech is {above} Crimson Analytics in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Crimson Analytics relative to Oracle Solutions?
SRP.A: Crimson Analytics is {below} Oracle Solutions in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Oracle Solutions relative to Luminara R&D?
SRP.A: Oracle Solutions is {above} Luminara R&D in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total innovation index?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Aether Tech}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total innovation index?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Luminara R&D}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Echo Labs's maximum Innovation Index in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Echo Labs's maximum Innovation Index is in {2012}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Oracle Solutions's minimum Innovation Index in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Oracle Solutions's minimum Innovation Index is in {2016}.

NC.Q: Between 2018 and 2019, did the total Innovation Index experience a larger or smaller change than between 2017 and 2021?
NC.A: The change in total innovation index between 2018 and 2019 was {larger} than between 2017 and 2021.

NC.Q: Between 2016 and 2020, was the average total Innovation Index higher or lower than between 2013 and 2019?
NC.A: The average total innovation index between 2016 and 2020 was {lower} than between 2013 and 2019.

NC.Q: Was the total Innovation Index in 2012 higher or lower than in 2014?
NC.A: The total innovation index in 2012 was {higher} than in 2014.

NC.Q: Was the total Innovation Index in 2015 higher or lower than in 2020?
NC.A: The total innovation index in 2015 was {higher} than in 2020.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Aether Tech} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Luminara R&D and Echo Labs first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Luminara R&D and Echo Labs first exchanged leading positions in {2013}.
